metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11958 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
re2c 1.3 has a heap-based buffer overflow in Scanner::fill in parse/scanner.cc via a long lexeme.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11958` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

re2c - 1.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: re2c package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3-1ubuntu0.1').
